title: Xayah Quote Exact Spelling
body: Hey Riot! I’ve been wanting to get a league tattoo for a long time, seeing as it means so much to me. I couldn’t decide what to get because I just wanted something simple and nothing spoke to me. The other day though I was playing Xayah and I noticed a quote that used to pass by over my head. “Once there was magic everywhere or as the Vastaya say.....” and she goes on to say it in Vastayan. I decided that’s going to be my next tattoo because it represents my view of the world as a whole and not just league. The trouble is I can’t seem to find the exact spelling for it :P people just usually put “xayah chants” and I would really appreciate if I could hear from you guys so I’m not putting a mis-spelled quote onto my body forever. Thank you! ^_^

replies.body:
The exact spelling is:

["Once, magic was everywhere, or as the vastaya say: Om upo sa't."](https://vignette.wikia.nocookie.net/leagueoflegends/images/a/ad/Xayah.move33.ogg/revision/latest?cb=20170422022652)

Also good candidates for tattoos, IMHO:

[Tavern brawls just seem to find me. ](https://vignette.wikia.nocookie.net/leagueoflegends/images/8/88/Xayah.move16.ogg/revision/latest?cb=20170422022607)

or...

[Okay.](https://vignette.wikia.nocookie.net/leagueoflegends/images/d/d9/Rammus_Select.ogg/revision/latest?cb=20121127014815)

{{sticker:slayer-jinx-catface}}
Hey slagle, was hoping if I could make a quick Nunu plug. If possible when writing his VO script for Nunu bot, you have to keep text to voice and the laugh {{sticker:zombie-nunu-hearts}}

"[I will surprise them with my decision—if the writer doesn't say anything.](https://vignette.wikia.nocookie.net/leagueoflegends/images/d/d1/NunuBot.move5.ogg/revision/latest?cb=20121127201114)" -  A real Nunu Bot quote

Off-topic, I'm very sorry.

If you have time for such funny posts could you take a look at the serious problem here which is Veigar's W being invisible to colorblind peope? I've been trying to attract riot's attention for months...
https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/gameplay-balance/nTNl2pGW-omega-squad-veigars-w-colorblind-people-unite
It's not my expertise but I can pass it on!

This is super late, sorry, but do you know the spelling of some of Xayah's other Vastayan chants?  Sorry for being late to the party, but I've been curious about the Vastayan language for a while as a Xayah one-trick.
I recommend having it printed on a shirt before getting it tattooed so you can find out whether you're okay with explaining it to 100% of the people you meet.

Thanks for the advice! But I’m 100% okay with explaining it to people! I already have a tattoo and that one was from a gumball machine thing at the tattoo store that let you bargain and you HAD to get whatever came out, so I think something like this is easier to explain lol
I mean you didn't have to. Could have easily said no.
I would've wasted $100 then haha and that wouldn't of been the optimal choice XD . Plus I'm happy with it ^_^
if no services were rendered, then they dont get your money.

okay it's a gamble and you don't have to spin it if you don't want to but I WANTED to, I WANTED to take that gamble and if you don't then you don't have to give them the $100 to do so. Once you do it you're agreeing to get the tattoo and I WANTED to do it so I gave them the $100.  And I'm HAPPY with it. So. I'm sure if someone really didn't want the tattoo they would refund it but I was following the rules of the gamble.
its faster to just send a ticket since you are almost guaranteed a response
